headline: Teledyne FLIR Defense Wins $15 Million Contract for Black Hornet 4 Nano-Drones
summary: OSLO, Norway, February 26, 2025--Teledyne FLIR Defense, part of Teledyne Technologies Incorporated (NYSE:TDY), has received an order from the German Army to provide its Black Hornet® 4 Personal Reconnaissance Systems to German armed forces.
